Package org.jungrapht.visualization.layout.model

Class Point

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jungrapht.visualization.layout.model.Point
  • public class Point
extends Object
    Simple, immutable Point class used for Graph layout. Included to reduce dependency on awt classes
    Author:
    Tom Nelson
